mapper.insert: insert into t_file_data (FILE_ID, ROW_INDEX, USER_ID, ROW_TYPE, ROW_DATA) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rowIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rowType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rowData,jdbcType=OTHER})

insert into t_file_data
FILE_ID,
ROW_INDEX,
USER_ID,
ROW_TYPE,
ROW_DATA,
#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rowIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rowType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rowData,jdbcType=OTHER},
mapper.select: select from t_file_data where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ROW_INDEX ASC
select from t_file_data where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ROW_TYPE = 1 and ROW_INDEX = -1
